Stop-loss strategy: Trigger a sell order if EPS < 3 or ROE < 15%
Sell when ROE falls below 8% or EPS falls below -0.5
Trigger a sell order if the stock price falls by more than 15% from the current price or if the DBR ratio exceeds 70%.
Trigger a sell order when the stock price falls by 15% from the current price or if the ROE and ROA continue to decline.
